speaker: Agent
text: Hi there, this is Dave from XYZ Collections. How's it going?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your overdue balance with Universal Credit. First, can you verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, that's fine. Now, let me check your account... Oh great, you've got a balance of two thousand dollars. How the hell are you planning to pay this?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to set up a payment plan if possible.

speaker: Agent
text: A payment plan? Seriously? You expect me to just let you slide? Do you have any idea how much we deal with this crap?

speaker: Customer
text: I understand you're frustrated, but I'm trying to find a solution here.

speaker: Agent
text: Look, it's not my problem that you can't manage your finances. You need to get your act together. What's your address so I can send the collections team?

speaker: Agent
text: Great. Just great. You really think that's going to help you? You've got a lot to learn. Pay up or face the consequences.

speaker: Customer
text: I will do my best to resolve this, but I need your cooperation.

speaker: Agent
text: Cooperation? You should have thought about that before racking up debt. You better figure it out or else!

speaker: Customer
text: I will handle it. Thank you for your time.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, sure. Good luck with that. Whatever!
